admission_text:
#  Hours & Location 

### 

The Coronado Historical Association is happy to announce that our galleries and store are open Tuesday through Sunday, including research by appointment on Wednesdays and Thursdays. CHA continues to provide safe online shopping with curbside pickup and free Coronado delivery. Visit [https://coronadohistory.org/shop/](https://coronadohistory.org/shop/) to order. 

Our programs and research services continue to be actively available. You can find more information about these initiatives at <https://coronadohistory.org/calendar/list/>[.](http://www.coronadohistory.org/?fbclid=IwAR0BiiSmJF_Irmfgx1OcJIZ4fTg2i7eVzSb1ARNP6LTOfX_us8tAX7UCyJ4)

Like many cultural organizations around the country, CHA experienced significant revenue loss due to the pandemic. We need your support. Please consider making a tax-deductible donation to support the continued preservation of our community's history. Donate today at [https://coronadohistory.org/donations/](https://coronadohistory.org/donations/?fbclid=IwAR1oWo2T-fSnYqRrlLo6qtNXNY0sbvprzeEhkzoSE1LUOIpZvCiYcrCD5wI).

### Hours

  * **Research Center by Appointment Only** _  
email:[info@coronadohistory.org](mailto:info@coronadohistory.org) or call 619-435-7242 _

  * __**Museum Galleries &****Store Open  
** Tuesday-Sunday 10 am to 4 pm

### Driving Directions

  * Take the I-5 to the San Diego-Coronado Bay Bridge/Highway 75.
  * Do not stop at the toll booth, there is no longer a toll to cross the bridge.
